mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu(menu_id, name, category, price, url, description, total_star, count_star) VALUES(#{menuId}, #{name}, #{category}, #{price}, #{url}, #{description}, #{totalStar}, #{countStar})
INSERT INTO account(user_id, password, table_number, authority) VALUES(#{userId}, #{password}, #{tableNumber}, #{authority})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, password, table_number, authority FROM account WHERE authority = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderList(order_id, user_id, menu_id, team_id, order_time, count, is_paid) VALUES(ord_seq.nextVal, #{userId}, #{menuId}, #{teamId}, #{orderTime}, #{count}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.menu_id, o.team_id, o.order_time, o.count, o.star, o.is_paid, a.table_number, m.name, m.price FROM orderlist o JOIN account a ON (o.user_id = a.user_id) JOIN menu m ON (o.menu_id = m.menu_id) WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND o.is_paid = 0 ORDER BY table_number

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.menu_id, o.team_id, o.order_time, o.count, o.star, o.is_paid, a.table_number, m.price FROM orderlist o JOIN account a ON (o.user_id = a.user_id) JOIN menu m ON (o.menu_id = m.menu_id) WHERE a.table_number = #{VALUE} AND o.is_paid = 0 ORDER BY table_number
mapper.update: UPDATE orderlist set count = count+#{count} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND team_id = #{teamId} AND menu_id = #{menuId} AND is_paid = 0
mapper.select: SELECT menu_id, name, category, price, url, description, total_star, count_star FROM ( SELECT menu_id, name, category, price, url, description, total_star, count_star, Rank() OVER (ORDER BY ROUND(menu.total_star/menu.count_star,2), menu.name DESC) rank FROM menu WHERE count_star > 0 ) WHERE rank <= 5 ORDER BY rank DESC

SELECT a.table_number, sum(m.price*o.count), count(o.menu_id) FROM orderlist o JOIN account a ON o.user_id = a.user_id JOIN menu m ON o.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE o.is_paid = 0 GROUP BY a.table_number ORDER BY table_number

SELECT o.count, a.table_number, m.name, m.price, o.order_time FROM orderlist o JOIN account a ON (o.user_id = a.user_id) JOIN menu m ON (o.menu_id = m.menu_id) WHERE a.table_number = #{VALUE} AND o.is_paid = 0 ORDER BY o.order_time
